topic.title: Test fn
topic.shortdesc: This file tests all of the attributes on an FN tag. It should also test xref'ing to FN because I don't yet test that elsewhere.

body.p: Test some footnotes here.This is a footnote with an ID, defined in the first paragraph.Footnote with no attributes, defined right after the one with the ID.

ul.li: Test a footnote with callout:This footnote has callout=bubba.
Test a footnote with outputclass: This footnote has outputclass=fnclass
Test a footnote with both callout and id: This has callout=call and id=fn2
Test a footnote with all of its random attributes: Everything specified, but not callout/conref/id
Test an XREF to the footnote at the top of my document:
Test an XREF to the footnote at the top of my document: with text
Test an XREF to the footnote at the top of my document:
Test an XREF to the footnote at the top of my document: with text
Test an XREF to the footnote in the middle of my document (the one with callout=call):
Test an XREF to the footnote in the middle of my document (the one with callout=call): with text
Test an XREF to the footnote in the middle of my document (the one with callout=call):
Test an XREF to the footnote in the middle of my document (the one with callout=call): with text

body.section: And now for something, completely different.Fn with an ID: . Conref to that fn:

Now put stuff inside footnotestest phrases: test apiname test bold (test boolean ->) test cite test cmdname test codeph test filepath test italic test inline image: test keyword test menucascade/uicontrol test msgnum test msgph [skipping object] test option test parmname test ph testing a quote (test state -> ) test sub test sup test synph test systemoutput test term tm to amazon test tt test underlined test uicontrol test uicontrol/shortcut test userinput test varname test wintitle test xref to the top. Now test blocks:
Now I will add the block-like elements, in reverse order:
test ul
test ul again
test ul again again
testing a table in an example
testing a
basic table
testing a syntaxdiagram
simple table simpler table end of simple table
simple table simpler table end of simple table
This is required cleanup in my exampletest pre test pre test pre pt this is a parml test
pt this is a parml test . Now test more blocks:
testing a paragraph. That's a novel idea. well, if it is I should put it in <lq>.
test ol
test ol again
test ol a third time testing a note, just a plain old note, not a special notetest msgblock test msgblock test msgblockLQ: Darryl Strawberry was sentenced to 18 months in prison Monday for violating his probation on a 1999 conviction on drug and solicitation of prostitution charges.test lines test lines test lines(that was a placement=break image). And finish off with more blocks: Figure in an example
Placing a figure in an example
placing a draft-comment in the example
dl in section this is what a dl in an example looks like
dl in section this is what a dl in an example looks like test codeblock test codeblock test codeblock simple list here . one more: oops I almost forgot to test screen which will have heavy usage I'm sure
